entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
